1.title: Speedrunning for The Drill
1.plot: Bless The Drill. The Remember Hour is back. Rash and Skid return to the safety of The Bunker to tell us of Speedrunning; a heroic act in which the most agile champions completed timed trials as quickly as possible for the glory of recognition by The Drill.

2.title: Painting Splat-Toons
2.plot: Bless The Drill. Expressing yourself within the appropriate, pre-approved guidelines set by The Drill keeps all us happy and safe. In the past, misguided souls would express themselves by forming "Splatoons" and painting the lands with the colors of their enemies' suffering.

3.title: Clibby F and The Lawbreakers
3.plot: Bless The Drill. Skid and Rash tell the fable of Clibby F and the Lawbreakers. Why they toiled endlessly over gears, no one knows. Also children, beware of robots and their 01101001 01101101 01110000 01100101 01101110 01100100 01101001 01101110.

4.title: Blue Hysteria
4.plot: Bless The Drill. Skid and Rash attempt to curb the epidemic of the Blue Hysteria, a condition in which the afflicted become soft, furry, and have the inescapable urge to go fast, eat chili dogs, and write questionable "fan-fiction."

5.title: Gamescrom
5.plot: Bless the Drill. Rash's favorite holiday, Gamescrom, is upon us. Skid and Rash share Gamescrom stories, exchange gifts, and experience all that ancient Gamescrom gatherings have to offer by using bunker-issued VR headsets.

6.title: The Italian Pipe Lord
6.plot: Bless the Drill. Rash and Skid discuss one of the greatest heroes to ever grace the planet: the Italian Pipe Lord. Our hosts reminisce about the Italian Pipe Lord's many adventures, including his most recent with the unpredictable Rabbads. Beware children, Rabbads are on the loose and have been detected near the bunker. If you see one, please immediately inform the Drill Threat Force and the extermination process will begin.

7.title: Destiny Too
7.plot: Bless the Drill. Rash and Skid learn all about their destinies. They also take a step back in time to discover how "vanguardians" competed against each other. Rash and Skid share a helpful training video to explain how one's destiny is in the hands of the almighty Drill.

8.title: The Diss Honord
8.plot: Bless the Drill. The legend himself, Jonathan Drill, rolls through to surprise Rash by bringing back his missing friend, Skid. The show goes on as Rash and Skid teach the kids about the Diss Honnord and the benefits of being resourceful. We also meet a couple of fun drill scientists who are doing very normal scientific things, and nobody should be alarmed by their presence. Fun.

9.title: Pocket Creatures
9.plot: Bless the Drill. Rash and Skid continue to reacquaint themselves after Skid's surprise return. Jonathan Drill stops by to learn about the pocket creatures and how they rose to power. A battle ensues and Jonathan Drill comes to grips with the emotional pain he's kept secret for years.

10.title: Indie-Penndents
10.plot: Bless the Drill. Rash and Skid teach the children all about the small tribes who tried to battle the mainstream kingdoms. The one and only Jonathan Drill is summoned to the mutant quarters and discovers something about himself that could topple the entire hierarchy of the Drill.

1.title: Gods of the Console Wars
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: The Grind
2.plot: Skid and Rash explain THE GRIND, a concept handed down to us from the age of RPG - teaching us the joy of doing repetitive tasks to win achievements. Leveling up and grinding are important to the survival of our world, and most importantly, Jonathan Drill (the eldest grandchild of our savior, The Drill). Just remember not to make The Drill sad or you might get exiled. Bless the Drill.

3.title: E-Sports
3.plot: Beretta Swiftknives makes a special guest appearance as Skid and Rash teach us about E-SPORTS, contests that gathered the greatest heroes of our time where they competed for the fate of their nations and the future of the planet. Those that dared to cheat were demolished by the mighty Ban Hammer. Bless the Drill.

4.title: Vaporware
4.plot: Skid and Rash warn us of the dangers of VAPORWARE. Never confuse the promise of something for the thing itself, like hope. Watch as one lucky dweller hopes to pass The Veils, the ultimate test of truth vs. vaporware. Bless the Drill.

5.title: The Con
5.plot: Skid and Rash teach us about THE CON, one of the most exciting Drill holidays. The Con is a gathering of tribes dressed in "koshplay" as they honor their gods with purchasing "merchanswag" and feats of endurance to prove they are worthy to see "free-views" and speak to their heroes at "panels." Bless the Drill.

6.title: Second Lives
6.plot: Skid and Rash teach us about SECOND LIVES. In the dark days before the Drill, people used magical portals to transport themselves into alternate universes to live out their second lives. Rash doesn't understand why anyone would want to leave their amazing world honoring the Drill. But Skid wants to find out and builds a portal of his own. Blasphemy.

imdb.title: The Remember Hour
plot: _The Remember Hour_ (qv) is a post-apocalyptic puppet show to learn about our past before the drill took us to our new home underground.
